original: Are you real sure about that?

original: Any student can solve this problem.

translated: Toutes les institutions ecclésiastiques nationales, qu'elles soient juives, chrétiennes ou turques, ne m'apparaissent que comme des inventions humaines, établies pour terrifier l'humanité, la mettre en esclavage et monopoliser le pouvoir et les profits.

original: I have no friends.

original: Leave it.

original: I adore his daughter.

original: You've got a big mouth.

original: It may rain at any time.

original: I know. I was there.

original: Your daughters are beautiful.

original: I am convinced that things will change for the better.
translated: Je suis convaincue que les choses vont changer pour le mieux.

original: What's happened is unimportant.
translated: Ce qu'il s'est passé n'est pas important.

original: What's new?

original: I only care about her.

original: It was this morning that they went to see Mr. Carter.

original: It's high time I left the office.

original: "Nice to meet you." "Nice to meet you, too."
translated: « Ravi de vous rencontrer. » « Ravi de vous rencontrer également. »

original: Who taught you to swim?

original: I don't have long.

original: There is no hot water.

original: Correct it, please.

original: I don't think you were followed.

original: There's quite a lot of things to do; do you want some help?

original: So Laban went into the tent of Jacob, and of Lia, and of both the handmaids, and found them not. An when he was entered into Rachel's tent, she, in haste, hid the idols under the camel's furniture, and sat upon them.
translated: Laban entra dans la tente de Jacob, dans la tente de Léa, dans la tente des deux servantes, et il ne trouva rien. Il sortit de la tente de Léa, et entra dans la tente de Rachel. Rachel avait pris les théraphim, les avait mis sous le bât du chameau, et s’était assise dessus.

original: Are you lazy or just incompetent?

original: I don't know how to reach you.

original: Follow your desire.

original: He lives next to me.

original: You're too hard on yourself.

original: Most of the people working here are bilingual, trilingual and multilingual.

translated: Tom et moi nageons ensemble une fois par semaine.

original: I want a dozen cream puffs.
translated: J'aimerais une douzaine de choux à la crème.

original: She's not half attractive.

translated: Il va bientôt pleuvoir, regarde ces nuages noirs.

original: While she was doing the marketing, I studied.

original: This tea is very nice.

original: It makes me feel dirty.

original: I am running short of money.

original: Whatever!

original: I don't care much for coffee.

original: Tom didn't like the picnic.

original: We're proud of that.

original: Sorry, what was your name?

original: It's minus 10 degrees at the moment.

original: Tom's daughter got pregnant at 15.
translated: La fille de Tom est tombée enceinte à 15 ans.

original: I'm not eating this.

translated: En Allemagne, il y a une superstition comme quoi si on allume une cigarette à l'aide d'une chandelle, un marin mourra en mer.

original: Marie will ruin her clothes.

original: Listen to her!

original: I thought that Tom was in Australia.

original: Type your password on the keypad.
translated: Tapez votre mot de passe sur le clavier.

original: This dress looks good on you.

original: I am tired of hearing it.

original: To my surprise, they ate the meat raw.

translated: Les attaques du 11 septembre 2001 et les efforts continus de ces extrémistes pour engager la violence contre les civils, a conduit certains, dans mon pays, à considérer l'Islam comme irrémédiablement hostile, non seulement à l'Amérique et aux pays occidentaux, mais aussi aux droits de l'homme.

original: Mary and Alice are sisters-in-law.

translated: Pendant le tremblement de terre de 2011 du Tohoku, les vagues du tsunami ont atteint une hauteur de 37,9 mètres.

original: Tom never came out of his coma.

original: We are soldiers in France, and we are citizens. Another reason to be proud, to be a citizen! For the poor, this consists in sustaining and preserving the wealthy in their power and their idleness. The poor must work there, before the majestic equality of the law, which forbids the wealthy and the poor alike to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets and to steal bread. That is one of the good effects of the Revolution.
translated: Nous sommes militaires, en France, et nous sommes citoyens. Autre motif d'orgueil, que d'être citoyen ! Cela consiste pour les pauvres à soutenir et à conserver les riches dans leur puissance et leur oisiveté. Ils y doivent travailler devant la majestueuse égalité des lois, qui interdit au riche comme au pauvre de coucher sous les ponts, de mendier dans les rues et de voler du pain. C'est un des bienfaits de la Révolution.

original: It looks as if it'll rain tonight.

original: I don't like tennis very much.

original: It could be deadly.

original: I think I'm gonna stay here.

translated: Hot dogs, noix et graines, morceaux de viande ou de fromage, raisins entiers, bonbons durs ou gluants, maïs soufflé, morceaux de beurre d'arachide, légumes crus, raisins secs, chewing-gum et guimauves sont des risques connus d'étouffement pour les enfants.

translated: Je me demande pourquoi il y a tant de guerres.

original: My public duties take a lot of time.
translated: Mes activités officielles me prennent beaucoup de temps.

original: I can't believe you're going to give away all your money.
translated: Je n'arrive pas à croire que tu vas donner tout ton argent.

original: I don't think you tried hard enough.
translated: Je pense que tu n'as pas assez essayé.

original: I don't work well under pressure.
translated: Je ne travaille pas bien sous la pression.

original: In America the young are always ready to give to those who are older than themselves the full benefits of their inexperience.
translated: En Amérique les jeunes sont toujours prêts à donner à ceux qui sont plus âgés qu'eux les pleins bénéfices de leur inexpérience.

original: The rooms are deserted.
translated: Les pièces sont désertes.

original: You're not allowed to eat those.
translated: Vous n'êtes pas autorisée à manger ceux-ci.

original: I am boiling the water in a saucepan.
translated: Je fais bouillir de l'eau dans une casserole.

original: Linux is a free operating system; you should try it.
translated: Linux est un système d'exploitation libre ; tu devrais l'essayer.

original: Did you go to the restaurant yesterday?
translated: Es-tu allé au restaurant hier ?

original: Sorry, I can't help you.
translated: Désolé, je ne peux pas vous aider.

original: How did you like your trip to Australia?
translated: Comment avez-vous aimé votre voyage en Australie ?

original: We'll be together soon.
translated: Nous serons bientôt ensemble.

original: This is obviously fake.
translated: Ceci est évidemment faux.

original: The girl wrote something on the page of the book.
translated: La fille a écrit quelque chose sur la page du livre.

original: In times of crisis one should never idealise the past.
translated: En temps de crise, il ne faut pas idéaliser le passé.

original: The Rhine is the boundary between France and Germany.
translated: Le Rhin est la limite séparant la France et l'Allemagne.

original: This is an old letter.
translated: C'est une vieille lettre.

original: It would've been nice if you'd helped me a little.
translated: Cela aurait été gentil si tu m'avais un peu aidé.

original: I got beaten up.
translated: J’ai reçu des coups.

original: Technology solved many of the problems.
translated: La technologie a résolu nombre des problèmes.

original: In other words, he is lazy.
translated: En d'autres termes, c'est un feignant.

original: You didn't have to come so early.
translated: Tu n'étais pas obligé de venir si tôt.

original: He turned pale the instant he saw her.
translated: Il est devenu pâle à l'instant où il l'a vu.

original: Do your children have their own rooms?
translated: Vos enfants ont-ils leur propre chambre ?

original: So valuable were the books that they were handled with the greatest care.
translated: Ces livres étaient si précieux qu'on les manipulait avec le plus grand soin.

original: Mary was afraid, but Tom was not.
translated: Marie a été effrayée ; mais Tom n'a pas eu peur.

original: Had I known it, I would have told you.
translated: L'aurais-je su, je vous l'aurais dit.

original: I'm the richest one here.
translated: Je suis le plus riche ici.

original: Did that work?
translated: Est-ce que ça a marché ?

original: Who'll look after your cat while you are away?
translated: Qui va s'occuper de ton chat pendant ton absence ?

original: It's unclear what went wrong.
translated: On ne sait pas ce qui s'est mal passé.

original: I took your umbrella by mistake.
translated: J'ai pris ton parapluie par erreur.

original: What is the cost of a beer?
translated: Combien coûte une bière ?

original: The difference between a lady and a flower girl is not how she behaves, but how she is treated.
translated: La différence entre une dame et une vendeuse de fleurs n'est pas la manière dont elle se comporte, mais la manière dont elle est traitée.

original: Betty killed her mother.
translated: Betty a tué sa mère.

original: Sami is a valuable staff member.
translated: Sami est un membre précieux du personnel.

original: The alarm rang and everyone had to evacuate.
translated: L'alarme sonna et tout le monde dut évacuer.

original: You are reading.
translated: Tu lis.

original: Since there was nothing left to do, we left.
translated: Comme il n'y avait plus rien à faire, nous partîmes.

original: She refused to accept the money.
translated: Elle se refusa à accepter l'argent.

original: Strive to simplify everything.
translated: Donnez-vous la peine de tout simplifier.

original: At first, I couldn't understand what he said.
translated: Au début, je n'arrivais pas à comprendre ce qu'il disait.

original: Elephants are herbivores.
translated: Les éléphants sont herbivores.

original: He showed his disapproval by raising an eyebrow.
translated: Il montra sa désapprobation en levant un sourcil.

original: It would be nice to get married.
translated: Ça serait chouette de te marier.

original: She grew up in Australia.
translated: Elle a grandi en Australie.

original: Their lifestyle is different from ours.
translated: Leur style de vie est différent du nôtre.

original: Nobody was allowed to go out of the room.
translated: Personne n'était autorisé à quitter la pièce.

original: Where is the remote?
translated: Où est la télécommande ?

original: I often skip breakfast.
translated: Je saute souvent le petit-déjeuner.

original: It wasn't the mark that he was expecting.
translated: Ce n'est pas la note à laquelle il s'attendait.

original: It's just not safe.
translated: Ça n'est simplement pas sécurisé.

original: Right!
translated: C'est ça !

original: We were really excited.
translated: Nous étions vraiment excitées.

original: I'm not sure this is necessary.
translated: Je ne suis pas sûr que ceci soit nécessaire.

original: I am Turkish.
translated: Je suis Turque.

original: What's your opinion on this?
translated: Quelle est votre opinion à ce propos ?

original: You must absolutely not lick the floor.
translated: Vous ne devez surtout pas lécher le sol.

original: This hall contains two thousand people.
translated: Ce hall peut contenir 2 000 personnes.

original: The box was full of strawberries.
translated: La boîte était pleine de fraises.
